Package org.webpki.cbor

Class CBORArray

java.lang.Object
org.webpki.cbor.CBORObject
org.webpki.cbor.CBORArray
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Comparable<CBORObject>
public class CBORArray extends CBORObject
Class for holding CBOR [] (array) objects.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    CBORArray()
    Creates an empty CBOR [] (array).

  • Constructor Details

    • CBORArray

      public CBORArray()
      Creates an empty CBOR [] (array).

  • Method Details

    • size

      public int size()
      Get size of the CBOR array.
      Returns:
      The number of objects in the array

    • get

      public CBORObject get(int index)
      Get object at a specific position in the CBOR array.
      Parameters:
      index - The position (0..size()-1)
      Returns:
      CBOR object
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the index is out of range.

    • add

      public CBORArray add(CBORObject object)
      Add object to the CBOR array.

      Also see insert(int, CBORObject)

      Parameters:
      object - Object to be appended to the array.
      Returns:
      this

    • insert

      public CBORArray insert(int index, CBORObject object)
      Insert object at a specific position in the CBOR array.

      The object will be inserted before the current object with the same index.

      Parameters:
      index - The position (0..size())
      object - Object to be inserted in the array.
      Returns:
      this
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the index is out of range.

    • update

      public CBORObject update(int index, CBORObject object)
      Update object at a specific position in the CBOR array.
      Parameters:
      index - The position (0..size()-1)
      object - Object to set
      Returns:
      Previous object
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the index is out of range.

    • remove

      public CBORObject remove(int index)
      Remove object at a specific position in the CBOR array.
      Parameters:
      index - The position (0..size()-1)
      Returns:
      Previous object
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the index is out of range.

    • encodeAsSequence

      public byte[] encodeAsSequence()
      Encode CBOR sequence.

      Return the objects in the array as a CBOR sequence using Deterministic Encoding.

      Returns:
      CBOR sequence

    • toArray

      public ArrayList<CBORObject> toArray()
      Create shallow copy of the CBOR array.
      Returns:
      Array of CBOR objects
